component.name: zograscope
component.summary: Primarily a syntax-aware diff, but also a collection of tools for dealing with source code built on top of that

description.p: Main purpose of zograscope is implementation of syntax-aware diff (currently for C, C++ and GNU Makefile languages).
However, the infrastructure for doing this makes it possible to implement various other tools that don't require precise understanding of the code like compilers do.
There are additional tools for highlighting, searching and collecting statistics about source code.
